00020 class GAIA_LOCAL Call {
00021   public:
00022     /* Enums */
00023     class State : public gaia::base::EnumBase {
00024     public:
00025         enum enumState {
00026             STATE_IDLE,
00027             STATE_ACTIVE,
00028             STATE_HOLDING,
00029             STATE_DIALING,
00030             STATE_ALERTING,
00031             STATE_INCOMING,
00032             STATE_WAITING,
00033             STATE_DISCONNECTED,
00034             STATE_DISCONNECTING
00035         };
00036 
00037         explicit inline State(enumState val)
00038                 : EnumBase(val) {
00039         }
00040 
00041         inline bool isAlive() const {
00042             return !(mValue == STATE_IDLE || mValue == STATE_DISCONNECTED
00043                     || mValue == STATE_DISCONNECTING);
00044         }
00045 
00046         inline bool isRinging() const {
00047             return mValue == STATE_INCOMING || mValue == STATE_WAITING;
00048         }
00049 
00050         inline bool isDialing() const {
00051             return mValue == STATE_DIALING || mValue == STATE_ALERTING;
00052         }
00053     };
00054 
00055     Call();
00056     Call(const Call& s);
00057     explicit Call(const CallProxy& proxy);
00058 
00059     virtual ~Call();
00060 
00061     Call& operator=(const Call& rhs);
00062 
00063     bool operator==(const Call& other) const;
00064

00069 
00070     Phone getPhone() const;
00071     bool isMultiparty() const;
00072     void hangup() const;

00081 
00086     bool hasConnections() const;
00087

00093
